title: Tour de France stage 6 preview: Shakeup on the first big summit finish
content:
Stage 6 — Thursday, July 6 Tarbes to Cauterets-Cambasque Distance: 144.9km (90 miles) Profile: Mountain stage Stage 6: Battle stations on the first big mountain stage of the Tour Following Tuesday’s wild ride, who knows what to expect. Jai Hindley (Bora Hansgrohe) is the new yellow jersey, and Jonas Vingegaard (Jumbo-Visma) will be looking to … Continued

Read the full article at Tour de France stage 6 preview: Shakeup on the first big summit finish on Velo.
author: sstokes
